EmailTemplate.subject: turbonomic information for Tuesday, 30th (1495463135.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jessie, Thanks for taking a few minutes out of your morning to speak with me! Here is a webpage that goes over general information for Healthcare organizations specifically: https://turbonomic.com/solutions/industries/healthcare/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/industries/healthcare/]]> Below I have also included the main value points for Turbonomic users. - Assuring Application Performance in Real Timeo 80% decrease in tickets and alerts- 33% Improved Performance Through Automated Decisions…validated by VMWare <[[http://www.marketwired.com/press-release/-2090139.htm]]>- Driving Efficiency in Environment o 40% increase in VM/Host Densityo - Defer capex purchases ≥ 1 year <[[https://www.techvalidate.com/tvid/4AD-741-425]]>- Capacity Planningo Forecasting and tons of “what-if” scenarios around h/w refresh, DC moves, Consolidations etc...o Supports on-premise and cloud workloads (Azure, AWS, Google, IBM)o Agility (Hardware, Storage, App, Container, Hypervisor, Cloud agnostic) Looking forward to connecting with you on Tuesday! If you have any questions between now and then please feel free to reach out. Thanks in advance,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116 </htm
